On 13/03/07, Michael Stack <stack@...> wrote:
> >  I heard that you consider to move to Maven2, is this scheduled sometime soon?
>  I've been practicing the migration over on the archive-access sister project and its been taking up a bunch of time.  The move from m1 to m2, in effect, requires a complete rewrite of our build (There is an m2 repository at http://builds.archive.org:8080/maven2/ and continuum is running at http://builds.archive.org:8081/continuum/servlet/continuum).  I do not see us getting to Heritrix in time for the 1.12 release.

OK, I'm curious how the pom file would be, which would be the modules,
dependencies, etc.

Cheers,
-- 
Laurian Gridinoc, purl.org/net/laur
